Question
========

In a class there are 30 students, three of whom are left-handed. Suppose that you want to randomly choose two of the 30 students sequentially, What is then the probability that two left-handed students will be chosen?

Answerlist
----------

* 1/30
* 2/30
* 1/100
* 2/100
* 1/145

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1/30: Incorrect
* 2/30: Incorrect
* 1/100: Incorrect
* 2/100: Incorrect
* 1/145: Correct
